tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grants (
  grant_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  organization_name TEXT,
  amount DECIMAL,
  grant_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE grants (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grant_amount DECIMAL,
  grant_date DATE,
  organization_name VARCHAR(255),
  grant_purpose TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE organizations (
  org_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  org_name VARCHAR(255),
  org_location VARCHAR(255),
  org_type VARCHAR(50),
  org_contact_person VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE recipients ( 
   recipient_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, 
   recipient_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL, 
   recipient_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, 
   organization_id INT NOT NULL, 
   FOREIGN KEY (organization_id) REFERENCES grants(grant_id) 
 );

CREATE TABLE grants (
    grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    nonprofit_id INT,
    grant_amount DECIMAL,
    grant_date DATE,
    grant_purpose TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE grants (
  grant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organization_name VARCHAR(255),
  grant_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
  grant_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE nonprofit_organizations (
  organization_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  organization_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
  organization_type VARCHAR(50),
  founding_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE grantors (
  grantor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  grantor_name VARCHAR(255),
  grantor_type VARCHAR(50),
  contact_email VARCHAR(320)
)

CREATE TABLE grant_categories (
  category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  category_name VARCHAR(50) UNIQUE,
  category_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE grant_relationships (
  grant_id INT REFERENCES grants(grant_id),
  organization_id INT REFERENCES nonprofit_organizations(organization_id),
  grantor_id INT REFERENCES grantors(grantor_id),
  category_id INT REFERENCES grant_categories(category_id),
  grant_date DATE
)
